dcterms:creator: Yu-Chuan Su
Dinesh Jayaraman
Kristen Grauman
dcterms:description: A dataset constructed from the MNIST dataset by backprojecting the digits into equirectangular projection with a resolution of 16080. The digit labels are used to train the source CNN, but they are not used to train the KTN.
dcterms:title: Spherical MNIST

dcterms:creator: Yu-Chuan Su
Dinesh Jayaraman
Kristen Grauman
dcterms:description: A real-world 360° video dataset containing 86 videos from four categories: Hiking, Parade, Soccer, and Mountain Climbing. Frames are sampled for training and testing, with a resolution of 640320.
dcterms:title: Pano2Vid

dcterms:creator: Yu-Chuan Su
Kristen Grauman
dcterms:description: A perspective image dataset with object annotations, where object bounding boxes are backprojected to equirectangular projection with a resolution of 640320.
dcterms:title: APascal VOC 2007
